member.name: M:AppLogic.AppConfigManager.SetConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the config instance to whatever is found at the path, or throws an exception if there is nothing at the end of the path or the file is not compatible. Also resets the EncodeJobManager instance.

member.returns: The encode job pulled from the database queue that matches the GUID, or null if no matching jobs are found.
